game.name: You Better Run
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, LAN PvP, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You Better Run is a chaotic local multiplayer party game for 2–4 players. A bomb, a crazy friend, and pure mayhem—run, betray, and outlast your buddies in this fast-paced island showdown!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You Better Run is a chaotic local multiplayer party game for 2–4 players. A bomb, a crazy friend, and pure mayhem—run, betray, and outlast your buddies in this fast-paced island showdown!
